items.text: tossed up on off stump, smoothly pushed into the covers
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: short, wide, slapped to the right of long-off off the back foot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: dangled up on middle, not much turn, front-foot drive to the covers
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: Tharanga moves away outside leg, this is slid in, inside edged to the leg side
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: short on middle, ticked to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: floated up on middle, Tharanga dashes down the track, gets close to the pitch and hoists it over mid-on. He watches the ball sail to the boundary again
items.postText: Prabath: "Consider this as the first big step on climbing our ladder from our rock bottom situation . Very happy to see everyone performing very well . Best of luck on the long journey ahead boys . "
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, SIX runs

items.text: deflected off the hips to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: hip-high short ball on the off stump, Danushka lines it up and swats it powerfully over square leg. Bam!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, SIX runs

items.preText: Ramitha: "When was the last time you saw Tharanga hit 3 sixes and no fours!"
items.text: bouncer outside leg, ducks under it, wide
items.postText: Pasan: "Remember the name... Sri Lanka it is... You never know when they hit you right in your face. Australia had a bit of it. Pakistan had bit of it. South Africa had a bit of it. India had bit of it .Now Bangladesh is having the same in their own back yard"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 1 wide

items.text: just short of a good length and outside off, muscled across the line to the right of deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.preText: Madusha olupath: "Hopefully this will be the turning point for Sri Lanka cricket.."
items.text: another bouncer over the shoulder, zings through to the keeper for another wide
items.postText: Kamsy: "Tharanga really is making a point here, once Kusal Perera his back there will be a huge competition for opening slots. Tharanga is showing here he can be aggressive too. Brilliant stroke making! "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length and skids in on middle, nurdled to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: Showkat Khan: "@Udara - Any team can have a good day or even a bad one. Judgement should be based upon over a period of games rather than just one game. "
items.text: tip and run to backward point. SL closing in on the final spot
items.postText: anver azeez: "T20 like start by SL !! raining sixes here..."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: clipped off the pads to square leg for another single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: slid through on off stump, played back to the bowler
items.postText: Sandeep: "@Showkat Khan. As a Sri Lankan fan who lived through 2017, i'd gladly take this one game"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: fired outside leg, slips past the bat, slips past the keeper and into the boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 5 wides

items.text: dropped short and wide outside off, Tharanga rocks back and cracks it past backward point, where the fielder throws himself to his right to stop the ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: floated up outside off, he leans into it, caressing the ball through the covers. What a smooth shot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed on middle, Tharanga stays leg-side of the ball and belts it away to the right of mid-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: Danushka gets inside the line of this length ball and works it to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: Danushka attempts a wild reverse-swat and watches the ball slide past the leg stump
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: back of a length and nips in on off from around the wicket, cramps Tharanga for room, blocked back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: dug in on middle, ducks under it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: back of a length and outside off, Tharanga employs the latest of late cuts and sends the ball to deep third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: short on middle, cramps Danushka for room, beats the pull, and hits him on the body
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunathilaka, no run
